code-assistant.label: Code Assistant
code-assistant.description: AI-powered coding assistance and code generation tools

ide-extension.label: IDE Extension
ide-extension.description: Integrated development environment extensions and plugins

research-tool.label: Research Tool
research-tool.description: Tools for research, documentation, and information gathering

tools.name: Warp
tools.description: AI-powered terminal that provides intelligent command suggestions, explanations, and workflow automation

userExperiences.quote: Using as an Advisor instead of an Engineer
userExperiences.useCase: Provides instructions, requests permissions to perform actions

userExperiences.quote: Fully sold after a few hours
userExperiences.useCase: Terminal workflow enhancement and command assistance

userExperiences.quote: Can't go back to using terminal without AI assistance

teamAdoption.notes: Having regular meetings to upskill in usage. Team members are actively sharing tips and best practices.

tools.internalSetupNotes: Available for download from official website. No special licensing requirements for individual use.

tools.name: GitHub Copilot
tools.description: AI pair programmer that suggests code completions and entire functions in real-time

userExperiences.quote: Dramatically speeds up coding, especially for repetitive tasks
Great for learning new frameworks and patterns
Sometimes suggests outdated or incorrect patterns
userExperiences.useCase: Need to review and validate suggestions carefully

teamAdoption.notes: Individual subscriptions. Some teams exploring enterprise licensing options.

tools.licensingNotes: Requires paid subscription. Enterprise licensing available for teams.
tools.internalSetupNotes: IT is working on enterprise licensing options. Currently available through individual subscriptions.

tools.name: Cursor IDE
tools.description: AI-first code editor built on VS Code with advanced AI integration for coding assistance

userExperiences.quote: More integrated AI experience than traditional IDEs with plugins
Excellent for debugging and understanding complex code
Learning curve for teams used to traditional IDEs

teamAdoption.notes: Early adopters are evaluating for broader team use. Mixed feedback on transition from existing IDEs.

tools.internalSetupNotes: Available for download. Some users report compatibility issues with existing VS Code extensions.

tools.name: Claude Code
tools.description: Anthropic's AI assistant specialized for coding tasks, code review, and technical problem-solving

userExperiences.quote: Excellent for code review and explaining complex algorithms
userExperiences.useCase: Peer review assistance and knowledge transfer

userExperiences.quote: Great for architectural discussions and design patterns
userExperiences.useCase: Technical decision making and architecture planning

userExperiences.quote: Limited by context window for very large codebases

teamAdoption.notes: Used primarily for research and complex problem-solving. Teams exploring integration into code review processes.

tools.licensingNotes: Subscription-based pricing with usage limits. Enterprise plans available.
tools.internalSetupNotes: Accessible through web interface. API integration requires technical setup.

tools.name: Perplexity
tools.description: AI-powered research assistant that provides accurate, sourced answers for technical questions and documentation

userExperiences.quote: Much better than traditional search for technical research
userExperiences.useCase: Finding solutions to specific technical problems
Validating technical approaches and best practices

userExperiences.quote: Sometimes provides outdated information for rapidly evolving technologies
userExperiences.useCase: Researching very recent developments or beta features

teamAdoption.notes: Widely adopted across teams for research tasks. Some teams have shared folders of useful queries and findings.

tools.internalSetupNotes: Available through web interface. Pro subscription provides additional features and faster responses.
